text: The Shape of Dolls is an EP by New Zealand band Able Tasmans, released on Flying Nun Records in 1993. ==Track listing== #"Dog-Whelk" – 3:43 #"The Big Bang Theory" – 3:59 #"Coming Up For Air" – 3:39 #"Mayfly May" – 4:19 #"The Shape of Dolls" – 3:47 ==References== Category:Able Tasmans albums Category:1993 EPs Category:Flying Nun Records EPs
title: The Shape of Dolls
